### Checklist

- [ ] Code follows project coding standards
- [ ] Best practices are followed
- [ ] The issue is fully resolved
- [ ] Changes are tested locally
- [ ] Unit test added
- [ ] E2E test added
- [ ] Demo video uploaded OR screenshots attached (if applicable)
- [ ] No breaking changes OR breaking changes are clearly mentioned
- [ ] No new dependencies OR dependencies are documented
- [ ] Cloud / deployment changes required (clearly mentioned if yes)
- [ ] Database migration required (clearly mentioned if yes)
- [ ] No sensitive data (keys, secrets) included
- [ ] Logs and debug code removed
